channel.title: Forgot my password
channel.description: Hey guys this was my alt account that i never used, but ive seem to run into a problem. I forgot the password on dannydude8 when we were force to do a password reset. Also i cant remember the email i used to make the account, if any mods are on can they assist me in this thanks!

item.title: Forgot my password
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

It would probably be better to PM MITB himself with the appropriate information instead of making a topic about it.

Doggie Skill:

I’m guessing Moparisthebest can’t give you the password because you can possibly be trying to hack him. I’m not saying you are, but just saying.

MITB can check the IP’s to the accounts to see if they match.

Read full topic
